languages.text: "О нет, только не смертоубийство во имя моей любви. Я не могу отвергнуть столь пылк{mf|ого|ую} поклонни{mf|ка|цу}, так зло надругаться над искренней страстью было бы грехом в глазах Великого!"
"I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"
languages.original_text: "О нет, только не смертоубийство во имя моей любви. Я не могу отвергнуть столь пылк{mf|ого|ую} поклонни{mf|ка|цу}, так зло надругаться над искренней страстью было бы грехом в глазах Великого!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh no, no killing in the name of my love. I cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh no, no killing in the name of my love. I cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh no, no killing in the name of my love. I cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «No puedo rechazar a un{mf||a} admirador{mf||a} tan apasionad{mf|o|a}, ¡insultar su pasión sería un crimen ante el Exaltado!».
languages.original_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: «Ah, no, nada de matar en nombre de mi amor. No puedo rechazar a un{mf||a} admirador{mf||a} tan apasionad{mf|o|a}, ¡insultar su pasión sería un crimen ante el Exaltado!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我无法拒绝如此热切的追求者，因为在至高无上的神皇眼中，侮辱如此真挚的激情是邪恶的行为！”
languages.original_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: “哦，不，千万不要以我挚爱的名义自杀。我无法拒绝如此热切的追求者，因为在至高无上的神皇眼中，侮辱如此真挚的激情是邪恶的行为！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「こんなに思ってくれる人を拒絶するなんてできないよ。こんなにも誠実な情熱を侮辱するなんてことは、エグザルテッド・ワンの目には邪悪な行為と映るだろうからね！」
languages.original_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: 「こんなに思ってくれる人を拒絶するなんてできないよ。こんなにも誠実な情熱を侮辱するなんてことは、エグザルテッド・ワンの目には邪悪な行為と映るだろうからね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Comment éconduire {mf|un prétendant aussi passionné|une prétendante aussi passionnée} ? Insulter un attachement aussi fervent serait un terrible manquement aux yeux de l'Exalté ! »
languages.original_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh non, je ne veux surtout pas de sang versé sur l'autel de mon amour. Comment éconduire {mf|un prétendant aussi passionné|une prétendante aussi passionnée} ? Insulter un attachement aussi fervent serait un péché aux yeux de l'Exalté ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann {mf|einen solch glühenden Verehrer|eine solch glühende Verehrerin} einfach nicht zurückweisen – solch aufrichtige Leidenschaft zu beleidigen, wäre in den Augen des Erhabenen abgrundtief böse!"
languages.original_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh nein, im Namen meiner Liebe wird nicht getötet. Ich kann {mf|einen solch glühenden Verehrer|eine solch glühende Verehrerin} nicht zurückweisen — solch aufrichtige Leidenschaft zu beleidigen, wäre in den Augen des Erhabenen abgrundtief böse!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"

languages.text: "Böylesi ateşli bir hayranımı reddedebilmem ne mümkün? Böyle samimi bir tutkuyu reddedersem Görkemli günah yazar!"
languages.original_text: "I simply cannot reject so ardent an admirer — to insult such sincere passion would be a wicked act in the eyes of the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi ateşli bir hayranımı reddedebilmem ne mümkün? Böyle samimi bir tutkuyu reddetmek Görkemli'nin gözünde bir günahtır!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
